metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6407 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The UpdateRequestHandler for XML in Apache Solr before 4.1 allows remoteattackers to have an unspecified impact via XML data containing an externalentity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to anXML External Entity (XXE) issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-6407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblucene3-contrib-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
liblucene3-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
libsolr-java - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-common - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-jetty - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
solr-tomcat - 3.6.2+dfsg-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lucene-solr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2+dfsg-8').
